metadata.title: CVE-2019-14198 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Das U-Boot through 2019.07. There is anunbounded memcpy with a failed length check at nfs_read_reply when callingstore_block in the NFSv3 case.

criterions.comment: u-boot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
